resources.string: Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
Enable orange status and navigation bars when battery saver is activated
Available RAM memory bar will be displayed on recents view
Toggle to display available RAM memory bar on recents view
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
This will hide all force close notifications
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
Battery bar position and color customization
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Press on color below to apply
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Navigation bar height while in portrait
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side (Landscape)
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Include foreground task when clearing all
Show Google search bar in the recents screen
Enable immersive mode for recents screen
Shows clock at the top while in fullscreen
Shows date at the top while in fullscreen
Stock recents are disabled while omni/slim recents are enabled
Change the view of the recents screen
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical position of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Select and preview system toast animation
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Check out the official BeanStalk download page to see if your device is supported https://www.androidfilehost.com/?w=devices&uid=23159073880933293
Send request to join the BeanStalk team slack room for discussion and development
Attention BeanStalk devs, please add me to the team Slack room!
Visit BeanStalk Github to view source and activity
Donate any amount to BeanStalk development. You may need to be logged into paypal first before continuing.
Double tap lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Swipe three fingers downwards to take a screenshot
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Configure location for weather widget and other settings
Enable to show weather options that go along with LockClock
Show basic weather in the extended statusbar area
Pick an icon for displaying the weather condition
Enable to colorize all icons, disable to colorize only the monochrome icons
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area.
Alpha value of the On-The-Go overlay. Needs re-toggling.
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Listen for touches on entire screen
Touching anywhere on the screen will cause buttons to un-dim
Only touches on the navbar will cause buttons to un-dim
Find a bug? Click here to send a report

Detailed report of the bug:

How to reproduce bug:

Attached logcat and/or screenshot?

Proposed resolution if applicable:

Additional info
Time that the screen stays on for notification pulse
Doze pulse will be triggered by pick up gesture sensor events
Pick up gesture sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by significant motion sensor events
Significant motion sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Predefined doze repeat intervals (normally [1s,10s,30s,60s,120s]) will be used (default)
Doze will only pulse once per notification
Brightness level of doze pulse screen (% of max allowed brightness)
Ambient display notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Ambient display notifications will show as inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Show battery saver notification when enabled
Show low battery notification when enabled
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Set custom animations for system keyboard
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Enable adjustment of max lockscreen notifications
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Blurs and displays the content behind your lockscreen.
Enable various network traffic options in status bar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Disables quick settings in the keyguard for a secure lock only
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Change the number of columns displayed in the dashboard
Show dashboard tile titles in 2 lines
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Number of QS tiles per row
Change the position of the dashboard switches
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Whether to allow global use of float mode, if this is off none of the below options will work DUH!!!
Launch Slim & Pie Actions in Floating Window Mode
Launch Gesture Anywhere shortcuts in float mode
Swiping up on the heads up notification will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Force heads up in all applications
For better visibility on bright images
For better visibility on themed headers
Require a double-tap to wake the device on a doze pulse screen
Require a simple-tap to wake the device on a doze pulse screen (default)
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel.
Show Charging Current rate on lock screen
Always display a notification when debugging is enabled, even if not connected
WARNING\u003A this disables a security check to prevent possible tapjacking! Use only if you understand the consequences.
Theme elements to change when a new theme is selected
